Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: icmm_worldstate_picker2
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Maria Egly
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Lets the user pick and load a world state from the ICMM.

Preference.name: category
Preference.description: Category of ICMM worldstates to be displayed
Preference.label: ICMM Category

Preference.name: level
Preference.description: Depth of worldstate tree to be displayed
Preference.label: Level

InputEndpoint.name: update
InputEndpoint.label: UpdateWSTree
InputEndpoint.description: Event received when worldstate tree shall be updated

OutputEndpoint.name: worldstate
OutputEndpoint.label: World State
OutputEndpoint.description: The world state selected by the user
